title: St Bride Conference update: one-day tickets are available
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014341/http:/www.typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 14.May.2008 8.44am 

Seeking Inspiration: creative thinking around the design process  
================================================================  
Seventh annual St Bride Library conference  
15-16 May 2008  
At St Bride Library, Bride Lane, Fleet St, London EC4Y 8EE

If you can’t make it to both days of the conference, then why not join us for either Thursday or Friday? Tickets will be available on the door for £60. Payments can be made in cash or by cheque with guarantee card.

[http://seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/programme.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014341/http:/seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/programme.html "http://seekinginspiration2008.stbride.org/programme.html")  
 [http://www.designweek.co.uk/Articles/138374/Article.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014341/http:/www.designweek.co.uk/Articles/138374/Article.html "http://www.designweek.co.uk/Articles/138374/Article.html")
author: Miss Tiffany
